newsitem.title: UGANDA: Ugandan shilling steady against dollar, pound.
newsitem.headline: Ugandan shilling steady against dollar, pound.

text.p: The Ugandan shilling was unchanged against the dollar and the pound in thin trade, dealers said on Tuesday.
They posted an average of 1070 shillings against the dollar, and at 1,730 against the pound.
"There was little business activity," a dealer from a forex shop told Reuters.
The Ugandan shilling has been depreciating steadily against the dollar since April on dwindling earnings from coffee, which accounts for 64 percent of Uganda's total forex earnings.
